comments: His herbarium is thought to have been destroyed.
examples: Sisyrinchium luridum in Bol. Soc. Arg. Bot. 11: 154 (1967) Rev. Inst. Munic. Bot., 2: 51 (1964)
source: Letter from A. Hansen 19 Feb. 1988 Told by D.Nicholson who corresponded with P.F.R. - Pierfelice. Year of death from Nicolas Garcia pers. comm.
